loginMsg: Log in to your CAP account
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
emailConfirmed: Your email has been confirmed. You can now log in.
accountNotConfirmedMessage: Your account is not confirmed. Please confirm your email.
confirmationEmailResent: A new confirmation email has been sent.
errorResendingConfirmation: There was an error resending the confirmation email.
confirmYourEmailMsg: Please check your inbox for the confirmation link we sent.
registerError: Registration failed. Please check your details.
oauthExistsError: This account is linked with Google login.
joinWaitListSubtitle: Sign up with your email to get early access to the Cardano Analytics Platform.
successWaitListMsg: Thanks for joining! You’re on the waiting list.
errorWaitListMsg: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
alreadyOnWaitListMsg: This email is already on our waiting list.
walletNotFound: No Cardano wallets detected. Install <nami>Nami</nami>, <lace>Lace</lace>, <flint>Flint</flint> or <eternl>Eternl</eternl> and reload.
shareMessageIntro: Join me on CAP — Cardano Analytics Platform
invalidUsername: Invalid username. It must start with a letter and have 6–30 characters (letters, numbers, dot or underscore).
confirmAccountDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

dashboard.emptyPrompt: Pin any table or chart from the chat to create your dashboard automatically.
dashboard.noWidgetsYet: No widgets pinned yet for this dashboard.
dashboard.loadError: There was a problem loading dashboards or widgets. The view may be incomplete until it reconnects.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.accessDeniedText: You need admin privileges to access this page. If you believe this is an error, contact the CAP administrators.
admin.searchPlaceholder: Search by email, username, or wallet…
admin.noUsers: No users found for this query.
admin.subtitle: Monitor CAP users, system metrics, basic node health
admin.userSectionSubtitle: High-level metrics about registered accounts and admin users.
admin.systemSectionSubtitle: Quick snapshot of CPU, memory and disk usage on the CAP backend node.
admin.tableSectionSubtitle: Search, inspect and manage individual CAP accounts.
admin.notifySectionSubtitle: Send an email to the ops team whenever a new account is created.
admin.notifyToggleLabel: Send email when a new user signs up
admin.notifyRecipientsHelp: One email per line. All will receive the notification when a new user account is created.
admin.notificationsTestOk: Test notification triggered. Check your inbox.
admin.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete user: {{email}}?
admin.confirmDeleteUserOnce: This will anonymize the user {{email}} and preserve their content. Do you want to continue?
admin.confirmDeleteUserAnonymized: This user is already anonymized. Deleting again will permanently remove their account and related data. Do you want to continue?
admin.errorLastAdmin: You cannot delete the last remaining admin.
admin.errorCannotSelfDeleteHere: You cannot delete yourself from this screen. Use your own account settings page.
admin.systemDetailsSubtitle: Detailed CPU, memory, disk and GPU metrics for the CAP backend node.
admin.systemGpusSubtitle: Usage and memory per GPU device.
